Descriptions: Serious, quiet, making achievements through patience, precision, and determination
Has practical, logical thinking, disciplined and trustworthy, always wants everything to be in order
Can self-motivate to do the job without relaxing
Prefers details and stability
Responsible, dislikes novels and superficial things
Respects traditions and sincerity
Patient, quiet, discreet
Objective and not sentimental
Observes and analyzes life deeply, handles situations scientifically, usually analyzes problems using lots of statistical data and practical experience
Focuses on what matters, likes simple but effective solutions, is very creative when addressing urgent problems
Calm, sentimental, responsible, caring and generous to others
Really cares about what others think of ownself
Devoted, diligent to do the job in time
Wants a stable life, lives practically, likes simple, easy but effective solutions
Respects the rules, traditions, and wants everyone to do the same
Always tries to balance between work and family
Calm, discreet, sensitive, considerate and kind
Very sensitive and can easily get hurt
Usually avoids controversy, does not assume opinions or values on others
In work, usually solves problems by using own experience in the simplest and most practical way
Likes details, precision
Does not want to be limited to the same patterns, schedules, can easily adapt to change
Has lots of creative ideas, always finds new ways to solve problems
Can have an overall view of the issue, is visionary, can make plans and is determined to achieve the set goals
Usually sets high expectations for ownself and other people
Usually explains everything scientifically, decides everything objectively
Very discreet, thinks deeply, lives independently and orderly
Quiet, discreet, always excels in competitions, especially in scientific and theoretical subjects
Has high creativity, is usually interested in new ideas instead of parties or chatting
Has strong personality, therefore likes a job that requires it
Has logical, broad, and visionary thinking, but does not like to be limited to the same patterns, is flexible and can easily adapt to change

A bit quiet, keeps to ownself and usually thinks about life, worldview. May appear cold and care about nothing but "silence" from the outside. But actually tends to observe, keep an eye on every little detail that happens. Relationships are built in a "slow and steady" manner. A little mystery that lives within makes everyone want to explore and figure out. This creates "attractiveness".
Has creativity and has the ability to work independently. Always thinks clearly before doing anything. Always has great passionate in whatever is being done.
Makes plans and is determined to achieve goals. Has the ability to make anything happen through clear vision and to best serve humanity.
Perfectionist, has a great passion for creativity, never limits ownself to available patterns, "traditional" methods but instead always thinks of new solutions to apply long-term
Does not really care about making plans that are too detailed but instead improvise
Towards friends or colleagues, always proves to be a trustworthy, caring, and helpful person
Sensitive, and can easily get hurt for minor reasons
Has the qualities of a leader, has the ability to arrange work perfectly, likes to take responsibilities
Is an ideal person for work, always analyzes and applies anything that is logical to work, decides quickly, always tries to do the job efficiently, so as to quickly get to the next work
Is responsible and expects everyone to be the same
Has the ability to organize, operate, likes to participate in community work
Has a tendency to be straightforward, not hesitant to criticize when necessary
Energetic, strong, practical
Usually finds simple, easily applicable solutions to deal with work
Prefers taking actions to thinking of and finding out new theories
Likes to meet up, communicate with people, sociable, sincere, easy-going but sometimes being "criticized" as indelicate
Kind, devoted, cooperative
Cares and helps others in every-day life
Loves harmonious living environment, works hard to make it happen
Likes to work with those who get things done and on time
Very good at making use of gained experience in work and life
Worries the most about things that can directly and clearly affect human life, not interested in abstract theories
Likes to socialize, make new friends, and expand relationships
Cares about the others and do the best to prove it with real actions
Likes to indulge and experience life rather than sit back and make judges
Easy-going, humorous, sometimes impulsive. Always know whatu0027s up and join in happily and enthusiastically, likes sports or social work
Likes to gain real-life experience rather than learning from theories
Has all the qualities to become a talented leader
Quickly identifies illogical, inefficient processes, policies
Knows how to run a system, solve the problems of a organization. Loves long-term plans
Knows how to encourage, motivate the others to do the job and complete the goals
Sincere, friendly, but also straightforward and sometimes hurts other people
Agile, talented, knows how to inspire, quick-witted and intuitive
Likes to address new and challenging issues. Good at having propspects and analyzing from strategic perspectives
Can read other peopleu0027s idea
Dislikes procedures, rarely works the same way for a long time
Always has passions and are always in a state of non-stop trying to achieve the goals
Enthusiastic, responsible, and trustworthy
Has the ability to communicate, is easily empathetic, understands other peopleu0027s needs and motivates them. Can easily recognize everyoneu0027s abilities and helps them develop those
Is a catalyst for individuals and groups to develop
Good with people, helps everyone find comfort and creates the groupu0027s spiritual strength
Has creativity, does not limit ownself to "ordinary" thoughts
Likes novelty: new ideas, new activities, new people,...
Good at communication, warm, friendly and cares about the others
Always optimistic and looks into the future. This is the kind of person who is "energetic", strong, enthusiastic, and has a life without constraints, can easily adapt to change
Has the ability to connect the dots and make observations, provide solutions to any problems
